reviews.title: Super Clean!
reviews.text: Came in late on a Sunday night, check in was easy and fast. Price was same as lowest online quote (worried about price when checking in without reservation online first), very clean room, very secure and comfortable setting, close to everything, would recommend to family and friends! Hot popcorn and coffee in the lobby, again felt very safe and comfortable here with family.

the front desk was the friendliest i've seen. the room was extremely clean. nice pool and hot tub, and they even have popcorn in the lobby in the evening! with the fridge and hair dryer in the room i needed nothing else. the breakfast was the best continental i've had. XXXX NICE
reviews.title: GREAT EXPERIENCE
